 English Translation
I tried my best :)
even if thousand sun heat you
even if color of grace reduces
even if injustice rule us
even if humans forgot love
even if your soul die on your journey
your love will never die

arise mind, arise mind
arise mind, arise mind
arise mind, arise mind
Love never dies

even if our worlds are different
even if our thoughts die
even if our age changes
even if child forgot laughing
even if natures fate derails
your love will never die

arise mind, arise mind
arise mind, arise mind
arise mind, arise mind
Love never dies

don't be afraid, don't be lazy
no pain, from now.
you'll take a new birth,
flower rain in your path, from now.

its true, your love will
live for ever
it won’t be lost,
it won’t be hidden in dark
